entry.title: Sour Patch Kids Zombie Theater Box - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mondelez
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

The Zombie that Wants You To Eat Them!

    The treat that's come to spook your tastebuds with a sour vengeance! These sour then sweet Sour Patch Zombie Kids are hauntingly delicious, and if you thought that they were tart before, you better believe they've gone truly sour now. Only the Grape and Orange flavours have risen from their graves, making them a part of the perfect palette to include in any festive Halloween candy bowl! Just be careful... if you hear a creak in the night, it might be these dastardly sweets trying to give you something good to eat!

 

(1 theatre box) 100g / 3.5oz

entry.title: AirHeads 72 Bar Assorted Box - 1.1kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle Inc.
Type: Candy
Price: 29.99

AirHeads Jumbo Box

72 Pieces in Assorted Flavours 

It's Fun To Be An AirHead!

Flavourful, colourful taffy that is full of intense fruity taste! Tremendously tangy, sweet, and chewy, AirHeads iconic texture and flavours are incredibly delicious. This is a large theatre pack filled with 72 bars of AirHeads comes with six delicious flavours, Blue Raspberry, Watermelon, Sour Apple, Cherry, Strawberry and White Mystery. 

 

Airheads make a great movie time candy, and now that it's in a 72 Pack, the candy eating experience is seemingly endless! All individually wrapped if you're inclined to share these 72 bars of nostalgic Airheads Candy. 
  • Zero Fat, Zero Sodium
  • Tree-Nut Free
  • Peanut-Free
  • Gluten-Free
  • Kosher Certified

 Fresh Candy Shipped Fast!

1.1kg

entry.title: Warheads Ooze Chewz Ropes - 3oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Impact Confections
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Warheads Ooze Chewz

NEW Extreme Sour Candy Ropes

Chewy Candy Filled with "Ooze"!

Sour, chewy candy ropes filled with ooze! Previously available in a theatre pack box, this new version comes in a 3oz pouch. 

Fun fact: A warhead is an explosive material that is delivered by a missile or a rocket. In that case, we think that Warheads candy is suitably named! War Heads candy will definitely be knocking your socks off with each candy exploding with fantastic fruity flavours!

These Warhead Ooze Chewz come in delicious 3 fruity flavours:

Watermelon | Blue Raspberry | Green Apple

Stay tuned for more! At Candyfunhouse, we add new items to our collection everyday. Click here to check out our newest products! 

3oz / 85g pouch

Fresh Candy Shipped within Canada & to USA!

Ingredients:

Sugar, Corn Syrup, Wheat Flour, Water, Citric Acid, Sorbitol. Maltodextrin, Sodium Citrate, Glycerin, Gelatin, Natural & Artificial Flavors, Salt, confectioner's glaze, Red 40, Yellow 5, Blue 1.

CONTAINS: WHEAT

ALLERGY INFORMATION: MANUFACTURED ON EQUIPMENT THAT PROCESSES SOY, PEANUT, AND MILK PRODUCTS.

 

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer are considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact manufacturer directly for the current date

entry.title: Sour Patch Kids Extreme Candy Theater Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Maynards
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Sour the Sweet-Soft and Chewy

Sour Patch Kids Candies are a theatre box of sour and sweet goodness in every bite. This Movie Theater Box is perfect for enjoying while watching a movie or to just enjoy anytime.

99 g

About Sour Patch Kids

It was a sunny day in 1985. The Kids couldn’t decide if they wanted to play a prank or give someone a hug when it dawned on them that choices just aren’t fun. Capitalizing on this stroke of pure genius, they set out to cause mischief and shower sweetness everywhere they went.

First, they're sour, then they're sweet.

Mischief-filled Sour Patch Kids start out sour then turn sweet.

Whether you’re trying to plan out the perfect prank or the ideal delight, these tasty little confections are chewy treats to be enjoyed when you’re in need of a play-filled break.

Sour Patch Kids come in single packs for individual snacking and bulk packages that are ideal for sharing (pfft who are we kidding, there will be no sharing). Get some for your next movie night, or just for a fun sour, then sweet treat for you, your family and friends.

Sour Patch Kids are Sour, then Sweet, then Gone.

Ingredients

Sugar, Invert Sugar, Corn Syrup, Modified Corn Starch, Tartaric Acid, Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavoring, Yellow 6, Red 40, Yellow 5, Blue 1.

entry.title: Goetze's Original Caramel Creams Theater Pack - 3oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Goetze's Candy Company
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Old Fashioned Bulls Eyes Candy

Now available in a King Size Theater Pack

Goetze's Original Caramel Creams A.K.A. Bulls-Eyes are a must-have candy for every candy connoisseur around! The Goetze's Original Caramel Creams have been around since 1895, and remain a number one caramel candy to this day! This superb old fashioned caramel candy has a deliciously creamy vanilla flavoured centre and is wrapped completely with delectable caramel!

For a truly incredible tasting caramel and a fantastic movie time candy, Bulls-Eyes will certainly fit the bill!
  • Nut Free
  • Made in the USA

1 box - 3oz / 85g

Ingredients:

Wheat flour, corn syrup, sugar, dextrose, partially hydrogenated soybean oil, whey protein concentrate, skim milk, high fructose corn syrup, cream, mono and diglycerides, salt, lecithin, corn starch, and artificial flavours.

Make it a blockbuster with the classic taste of M&M's Peanut Chocolate Candies!

entry.title: Boston Baked Beans Candy Theater Pack - 4.3oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Candy Coated Peanuts 

"Peanuts dressed up in a sweet, crunchy candy coating and always ready for a movie."

Don't worry Boston Baked Beans are really not beans! They are a crunchy and delectable sweet candy-coated peanut! Made using the panning process, which in this case, is layers and layers of a red candy coating! 

This old fashioned candy goes great with any movie. You won't hear much crunching during the movie either, they'll be gone before you know it! Better get two boxes, especially if you're into "sharing".
A favourite classic candy since the 1930s, Boston baked Beans are always in style!

4.3 oz. (122g)

 

INGREDIENTS:

Sugar, Peanuts, Corn Syrup, Modified Food Starch (Corn), Acacia (Gum Arabic), Confectioner's Glaze (Shellac), Artificial Flavor, Carnauba Wax, White Mineral Oil, Red 40, Yellow 5, Yellow 6, Blue 2.

Contains Peanuts.

This product was manufactured in a facility where milk, eggs, almonds, coconut and soy are used in the production of other products. Products may be artificially flavoured. Reference product packaging for details.

NUTRITION FACTS

Serving Size: 13 pieces
Calories: 70
Fat: 2.5g
Sodium: 0mg
Sugar: 10g

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Dubble Bubble Gum Theatre Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tootsie Roll Industries
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Dubble Bubble Original Bubble Gum

America's Original Bubblegum!

This is the sweet pink stuff that candy connoisseurs dream of! The Dubble Bubble Theatre pack is a must-have for every edge of your seat cliffhanger! Chewing on some delicious, old fashioned Bubblegum during those tense movie scenes is always ideal!

Dubble Bubble has been a favourite since 1928, upon unwrapping this sweet Bubble Gum you will be magically transported back to the good old days! You'll also find an amusing comic in every luscious piece! 
For a sweet and succulent Bubble Gum experience, there is only one Dubble Bubble!
  • Original Bubble Gum Flavour
  • Box Contains Approx. 17 Pieces
  • Made in Canada
  • Peanut Free
  • Tree Nut Free
  • Kosher Certified Parve

Swedish Fish Mini Tropical Soft & Chewy Candy

You never want to appear like a "fish out of water", especially during a candy-filled movie night!

entry.title: WarHeads Sour Chewy Cubes Theatre Pack - 4oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Impact Confections
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Sweet & Sour Candy from Warheads

Make your movie night extra exciting and action-packed with the Warheads sour Chewy Cubes Theatre pack! Pucker up for these extremely sour candies, it's going to be a very bumpy ride for your taste buds! 

These chewy cubes pretend to be sweet on the outside but are truly superbly sour on the inside. Talk about a bait and switch!
The Warheads Sour Chewy Cubes come in some very distinctive, perhaps sourly disturbing( to some only sweet candy eaters) flavours like Black Cherry, Blue Raspberry, Orange, Watermelon, and Green Apple. 

4oz (113g)

Ingredients:

Sugar, corn syrup, corn starch, modified corn starch, citric acid, red 40, yellow 6, blue 1, artificial colour, natural and artificial flavours, fumaric acid, sodium citrate.

Manufactured on equipment that processes milk, soy and peanut products.
